pull.title: Process: Activate BIP3
pull.body:
This pull request depends on the commits in #1819 and therefore is still only a draft pull request.

However, this is what the application of the changes prescribed by BIP 3 in the section [Updates to Existing BIPs should this BIP be Activated](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0003.md#updates-to-existing-bips-should-this-bip-be-activated) would look like. The first commit of this pull request is [process: Activate BIP3](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1820/commits/62d39cf9cef27ed409160e218b6e3ee2584415a9).


Todos:

- [x] Update of the CI-scripts
- [ ] Evaluate Informational BIPs regarding update to Specification type
- [ ] BIPs that have had Draft status for extended periods will be moved to Complete or Deployed as applicable in collaboration with their authors. 
- [ ] The authors of incomplete Draft BIPs will be contacted to learn whether the BIPs are still in progress toward Complete, and will otherwise be updated to Closed as described in the [Workflow](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0003.md#workflow) section above.

labels.name: Pending acceptance
labels.description: This BIP modification requires sign-off by the champion of the BIP being modified

labels.name: Process
labels.description: Trying to update process or stuck due to disagreement about Process

events.body: I have updated the `scripts/buildtable.pl` in lock step with each of the changes so that the build script passes for every commit. The remaining tasks should probably be handled in follow-ups as they will take a variable amount of time.
Rebased on the latest version of #1819.

process: Proposed ↦ Complete

Amend CI script to new statuses and update existing status field values
in table and BIPs.

```
sed -z -i 's/Status: Proposed/Status: Complete/' bip-0*.md
sed -z -i 's/Status: Proposed/Status: Complete/' bip-0*.mediawiki
sed -i 's/| Proposed/| Complete/' README.mediawiki
```

tree 6ec3818c3aedba66cf421bf1a7c475b7fdff714a

author Murch <murch@murch.one> 1744656454 -0700
committer Murch <murch@murch.one> 1750463687 -0700

BIP372: Drop redundant Discussions-To Header

BIP2 states that the Discussions-To header should only be used if the
proposal was discussed somewhere else beside the Bitcoin Developer
Mailing List. Therefore, the only use of the Discussions-To header in
the repository is unnecessary and can be removed before the header is
abolished.

events.message:
BIP372: Drop redundant Discussions-To Header

BIP2 states that the Discussions-To header should only be used if the
proposal was discussed somewhere else beside the Bitcoin Developer
Mailing List. Therefore, the only use of the Discussions-To header in
the repository is unnecessary and can be removed before the header is
abolished.
